description:
UserManager._getEffectiveAmounts(address,uint256) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#892-938) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- coinAge.diff == 0 (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#931-937)

UserManager.debtWriteOff(address,address,uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#750-814) ignores return value by comptroller.updateTotalStaked(stakingToken,totalStaked - totalFrozen) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#811)

UserManager.batchUpdateFrozenInfo(address[]) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1021-1041) ignores return value by comptroller.updateTotalStaked(stakingToken,totalStaked - totalFrozen) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1040)

UserManager._getEffectiveAmounts(address,uint256) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#884-925) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- coinAge.diff == 0 (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#918-924)

Reentrancy in UserManager.unstake(uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#711-731):
	External calls:
	- comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#718)
	- remaining = IAssetManager(assetManager).withdraw(stakingToken,msg.sender,amount) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#720)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- staker.stakedAmount -= actualAmount (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#727)
	UserManager.stakers (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#144) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- UserManager._getCoinAge(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1050-1065)
	- UserManager._validateNewMember(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1067-1087)
	- UserManager.addMember(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#518-521)
	- UserManager.checkIsMember(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#428-430)
	- UserManager.debtWriteOff(address,address,uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#750-810)
	- UserManager.getCreditLimit(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#440-446)
	- UserManager.getStakeInfo(address,uint256) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#935-941)
	- UserManager.getStakerBalance(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#471-473)
	- UserManager.getTotalLockedStake(address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#479-481)
	- UserManager.getVouchingAmount(address,address) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#500-506)
	- UserManager.onWithdrawRewards(address,uint256) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#951-971)
	- UserManager.stakers (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#144)
	- UserManager.updateLocked(address,uint96,bool) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#822-874)

description: UserManager.stake(uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#681-702) ignores return value by comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#684)
UserManager.unstake(uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#711-731) ignores return value by comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#718)
UserManager.withdrawRewards() (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#736-738) ignores return value by comptroller.withdrawRewards(msg.sender,stakingToken) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#737)

UserManager.debtWriteOff(address,address,uint96) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#750-810) ignores return value by comptroller.updateTotalStaked(stakingToken,totalStaked - totalFrozen) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#807)

UserManager.batchUpdateFrozenInfo(address[]) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#999-1019) ignores return value by comptroller.updateTotalStaked(stakingToken,totalStaked - totalFrozen) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#1018)

AssetManager.rebalance(address,uint256[]) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#507-550) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amountToDeposit == 0 (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#536)

UToken._repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#601-668) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- repayAmount == 0 (contracts/market/UToken.sol#605)

UToken.exchangeRateStored() (contracts/market/UToken.sol#467-470) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply_ == 0 (contracts/market/UToken.sol#469)

UserManager._getEffectiveAmounts(address,uint256) (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#908-954) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- coinAge.diff == 0 (contracts/user/UserManager.sol#947-953)

Comptroller._getInflationIndexNew(uint256,uint256) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#389-393) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- blockDelta == 0 (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#391)

Comptroller._getRewardsMultiplier(Comptroller.UserManagerAccountState) (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#450-462) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- user.effectiveStaked == 0 (contracts/token/Comptroller.sol#452)

Reentrancy in UToken._repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#601-668):
	External calls:
	- IUserManager(userManager).updateLocked(borrower,(repayAmount - interest).toUint96(),false) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#632)
	- IUserManager(userManager).onRepayBorrow(borrower) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#637)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows[borrower].lastRepay = 0 (contracts/market/UToken.sol#643)

	- UToken.calculatingInterest(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#477-494)
	- UToken.debtWriteOff(address,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#688-702)
	- UToken.getBorrowed(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#411-413)
	- UToken.getLastRepay(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#380-382)

	UToken.accountBorrows (contracts/market/UToken.sol#143) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- UToken.calculatingInterest(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#477-494)
	- UToken.debtWriteOff(address,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#688-702)
	- UToken.getBorrowed(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#411-413)
	- UToken.getLastRepay(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#380-382)
	- accountBorrows[borrower].interestIndex = borrowIndex (contracts/market/UToken.sol#659)
	UToken.accountBorrows (contracts/market/UToken.sol#143) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- UToken.calculatingInterest(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#477-494)
	- UToken.debtWriteOff(address,uint256) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#688-702)
	- UToken.getBorrowed(address) (contracts/market/UToken.sol#411-413)

description:
Reentrancy in AssetManager.withdraw(address,address,uint256) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#327-369):
	External calls:
	- IERC20Upgradeable(token).safeTransfer(account,withdrawAmount) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#341)
	- supply = moneyMarket.getSupply(token) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#351)
	- moneyMarket.withdraw(token,account,withdrawAmount_scope_0) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#355)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender][token] = balances[msg.sender][token] - amount + remaining (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#362)
	AssetManager.balances (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#42) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- AssetManager.balances (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#42)
	- AssetManager.debtWriteOff(address,uint256) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#374-378)
	- totalPrincipal[token] = totalPrincipal[token] - amount + remaining (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#363)
	AssetManager.totalPrincipal (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#48) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- AssetManager.debtWriteOff(address,uint256) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#374-378)
	- AssetManager.getLoanableAmount(address) (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#169-172)
	- AssetManager.totalPrincipal (contracts/asset/AssetManager.sol#48)
